mdRecord.dcterms:title: Thomas Jefferson, wearing a mask, to be photographed,
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Galt, Alexander (American sculptor, 1827-1863) [work]
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Photographed in the Rotunda. Commissioned by the Virginia General Assembly in 1854; installed 1868 in the Dome Room. Rescued from the Rotunda fire, 1895. Currently installed in the Rotunda Center Stair Hall (C202), second floor. -- Hogan, The Lawn (1987); https://news.virginia.edu/content/mr-jefferson-makes-his-triumphant-return [work]
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: James Murray Howard University of Virginia Historic Buildings and Grounds Collection
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Sculpture and Installations

sculpture (visual work)
Jefferson, Thomas (American statesman, architect, and draftsman, 1743-1826)
